alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued February 26 at 5:22PM CST until February 26 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN LIPSCOMB AND SOUTHEASTERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 521 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles southwest of Wolf Creek Park, or 17 miles south of Perryton, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Booker and Wolf Creek Park. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<1.00IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
